description: Variation of conditions nos: U0173337 (Tree planting and soft/ hard landscaping), U0173338 (Ecological Enhancements), U0173339 (Biodiverse green roof(s) and U0173341 (Detailed drainage design) of planning permission 23/1896/FUL dated 22 January 2024 to change the wording from 'Prior to commencement of works...' to 'Prior to commencement of relevant works…’ in connection with a development comprising the demolition of one-storey former Nursery building and two-storey Ex-school caretakers house and subsequent construction of a two-storey school building for 25 pupils aged 11-19 with severe and complex learning difficulties, including those with an additional diagnosis of autism and/or physical/sensory disabilities.
